Visualization¶

Network Information¶

print_network_measures(network)

Prints information about the network

Average Degree Boxplot¶

plot_avg_degree_group(attr_degree_list, measures)

Plot boxplot for the average degrees

Contact Matrix Heatmap¶

plot_cm_heatmap(contact_matrix)

Plots a heatmap for a given contact matrix

Null model histogramm¶

plot_diff_scales(ax1, x_value, y_value, …)

Creates the subplots

plot_null_model_subplots(Data, runs[, …])

Creates a figure for all attribute-value combinations

Probability distribution histogramm¶

plot_contact_duration(list_x_y, color_list, …)

Plots the probability distribution of the contact duration

plot_triangle_duration(list_x_y, color_list, …)

Plots the probability distribution of the triangle duration

plot_inter_contact_duration(list_x_y, …)

Plots the probability distribution for the inter-contact duration
